item.title: R3CEV Partners with Microsoft to Boost Bank Blockchain Adoption
item.description:
R3CEV Partners with Microsoft to Boost Bank Blockchain Adoption

Microsoft has recently entered into a strategic partnership with R3CEV to offer its Azure cloud-based infrastructure for the development of blockchain solutions. Microsoft has been making the right moves to capture the growing bitcoin and blockchain technology market.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Technical Analysis for 04/05/2016 - Low Volatility So Far... - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Technical Analysis for 04/05/2016 - Low Volatility So Far... - NEWSBTC

Bitcoin price is undergoing low trading volatility conditions, as investors are holding out for top-tier market catalysts this week. Bitcoin price is undergoing low trading volatility conditions, as investors are holding out for top-tier market catalysts this week. Bitcoin price is still on an uptrend but it is in a slow crawl these days.

item.title: Coinsilium announces First Blockchain Tech Lab Event in London
item.description:
Coinsilium announces First Blockchain Tech Lab Event in London

London, UK - Wednesday 30 March 2016 - Coinsilium, the London-listed blockchain technology investment and development company, is proud to announce its inaugural "Blockchain Tech Lab". The Blockchain Tech Lab has been launched to address growing concerns about the blockchain skills gap.

item.title: Ethereum Price Technical Analysis 04/05/2016 - Target Achieved, Sell More? - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Ethereum Price Technical Analysis 04/05/2016 - Target Achieved, Sell More? - NEWSBTC

Ethereum price weakened against the US Dollar, and moved towards $11.00. It looks like selling remains a preferred option in the short term. Ethereum price weakened against the US Dollar, and moved towards $11.00. It looks like selling remains a preferred option in the short term.

item.title: Investment Services Firm Offering Anonymity and Security
item.description:
Investment Services Firm Offering Anonymity and Security

The new investment firm AnonInvest has officially been launched, and its unique integration of revolutionary technology will offer a fundamentally different mode of investment. AnonInvest utilises trusted and long-established investment strategies coupled with newer, innovative strategies which utilise peer-to-peer networks to facilitate trade and accessibility.

item.title: Why OpenBazaar Is Not Your Average Bitcoin Marketplace
item.description:
Why OpenBazaar Is Not Your Average Bitcoin Marketplace

Although there is a lot of competition in the world of online marketplaces, OpenBazaar feels they will have a leg up over their competitors. OpenBazaar is one of those projects Bitcoin and blockchain enthusiasts have been looking forward to for quite a long time.

item.title: Proof of Individuality, the New-Age Security on Blockchain - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Proof of Individuality, the New-Age Security on Blockchain - NEWSBTC

Proof of Individuality protocol is designed to prevent Sybil attacks on peer-to-peer network based computer reputation systems. Read more... The virtual world is full of threats; Sybil attacks make a sizeable chunk of it. Especially with the increasing implementation and usage of peer-to-peer networks, the network infrastructure lies more exposed to such attacks than ever.
